page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: {HALL FARM (cont) {POTATOES }The majority of the crop is for the crisp market. The potatoes are delivered to a factory in Widnes where they are processed into crisps. The remainder are sold for prepacking. {SUGAR BEET}All the sugar beet is delivered to the {ALLSCOTT}factory where it is processed into sugar. {WHEAT}is grown for seed, milling and feed. {BARLEY}is grown for seed,feed and malting.The malting barley is sold to the {MALTINGS, SHREWSBURY,}which is owned by {ALLIED BREWERIES.} {OILSEED RAPE.} The seed is crushed and processed into vegetable cooking oil. {MILK. }At present there is a herd of 110 cows and 58 followers.They are British Friesian Holstein X breed. All the milk is delivered to the local
